Question.Subject: I need a Firefox theme...Any suggestions?
Question.Content: Ok i used to have a simple white one with some color spatter and now i am bored of it. Do you guys have the link to an interesting one? Or the one you are using...I want some ideas. Thank you! I must have deleted my add-on because i can't do this...>.<
Question.ChosenAnswer: I'm using the Coldplay butterflies because I like Coldplay. If you want to see what others are using, click the little fox on the lower left corner of the browser and check out the "New & Featured" section and the "Most Popular" section. If you still don't like those, check out the "All" section to see what's popular among the categories.

Answer.Content: I'm using the Coldplay butterflies because I like Coldplay. If you want to see what others are using, click the little fox on the lower left corner of the browser and check out the "New & Featured" section and the "Most Popular" section. If you still don't like those, check out the "All" section to see what's popular among the categories.
